## Feature Type / 功能类型

- [ ] New command / 新命令
- [ ] New rule / 新规则
- [ ] New skill / 新技能
- [ ] New agent / 新智能体
- [ ] New hook script / 新钩子脚本
- [ ] Documentation / 文档
- [ ] Other / 其他

## Problem / 问题

What problem does this feature solve?
这个功能解决什么问题？

## Proposed Solution / 建议方案

Describe the solution you'd like.
描述你想要的方案。

## Example / 示例

Show how this feature would be used.
展示这个功能如何使用。

```markdown
# For a new command, show the expected format
# 对于新命令，展示期望的格式

/your-command

## Expected behavior
...
```

## Alternatives Considered / 考虑过的替代方案

Any alternative solutions or workarounds you've considered.
你考虑过的其他方案或替代方法。

## Additional Context / 补充信息

Any other context, screenshots, or references.
其他背景、截图或参考资料。

## Would you like to contribute this? / 你愿意贡献吗？

- [ ] Yes, I'd like to submit a PR / 是的，我想提交 PR
- [ ] I need help implementing this / 我需要帮助实现
- [ ] Just a suggestion / 只是建议
